column1: Art Institute of Chicago////One of the things that was suggested as a must do in Chicago. Tickets were $20/person. Â While I am not an art person
column2: it definitely was a very nice art museum. A lot bigger than I thought
column3: and very well put together. There are so many floors of tons of art everywhere. There's so much to see. We got to see the Obama portraits which was cool. They have you put yourself on a virtual line with a QR code and would text you when it's your turn to enter to see the Obama portraits since it's such a popular exhibit right now. There were a few Van Gogh artworks
column4: as well as his self portrait which was kinda cool to see.
